name: swipeable-product-card
author: jjf2009
preview: A visually immersive product card with swipeable images, navigation buttons, product details, price, badges, and a call-to-action button.

props.name: title
props.description: Product name displayed on the card

props.name: price
props.description: Price of the product displayed in the card

props.name: badges
props.description: Highlight tags like 'Top Pick' or 'Only 9 left'

props.name: images
props.description: Array of image URLs for the swipeable carousel

props.name: onButtonClick
props.description: Callback function when the button is clicked

props.name: enableSwipe
props.description: Enable swipe gestures for image carousel
